page.syntax: Result as P = a5_RefreshPassiveLinkTable(C tablename [,L FlagreportResults [,L promptForOverwrite [,* arguments [,* otherOptions [,* openConnection [,L suppressErrorMessages [,L showProgress [,L allowCancel ]]]]]]]])

argument.name: Result
argument.description: A dot variable that describes the result of the operation.

item.name: .error
item.description: L, .T. indicates that an error occurred

item.name: .errorText
item.description: C, A text description of any error that occurred.

argument.name: tablename
argument.description: The name of the table to refresh. The path of the current database is assumed.

argument.name: FlagreportResults
argument.description:
Logical. Optional. Default = .F.
.T. = If an error occurred, displays a message that tells you what the error was.
.F. = No error reporting.

argument.name: promptForOverwrite
argument.description:
Logical. Optional. Default = .T.
.T. = displays a message that warns you that you are about to delete the current table's contents.
.F. = no prompt.

argument.name: arguments
argument.description: Optional. Default = NULL_VALUE(). Arguments that retrieve value(s) from variable(s) or prompts for value(s) at runtime. Only applicable to SQL Reports. Refer to SQL::Arguments Object.

argument.name: otherOptions
argument.description: Optional. Default = NULL_VALUE(). Sets filter (WHERE) and order (ORDER BY) expressions for a query against a passive-linked table. A pointer dot variable with 2 elements. Refer to Using the Options Argument.

item.name: .filterCAdds to the WHERE clause in the underlying SQL expression.
.orderCReplaces the ORDER BY clause in the underlying SQL expression.

page.description: Updates the data in a Passive-Link Table.
page.discussion: The A5_RefreshPassiveLinkTable() function deletes the data in a passive-linked table, then retrieves its records from the specified SQL data source.
page.example:
? A5_RefreshPassiveLinkTable("northwindproducts", .t., .t.) = error = .F. errorText = ""
? A5_RefreshPassiveLinkTable("customer", .f., .t.) = error = .T. errorText = "Table is not a Passively Linked Table."

section.description: This script refreshes all passive link tables.
section.example:
dim tableList as C dim count as N dim i as N dim pr as P dim table_i as C
tableList = <<%txt% pl_cust pl_customes pl_vendor%txt%
count = line_count(tableList)
for i = 1 to (count) table_i = word(tableList,i,crlf()) pr =a5_RefreshPassiveLinkTable(table_i,.f.,.f.) if pr.error = .t. then ui_msg_box("Error","Table data was not refreshed: '" + table_i + "'." + crlf(3) + "Error reported was: " + crlf() + pr.errorText, UI_STOP_SYMBOL) end if next i
